title: Looking for 4 man I can practice top w/
body: Hey all I'm a support one trick looking to learn different lanes and champs so I'm looking for four other people to play norms with in a few hours to play with, anyone will do :) I hoping to mainly play top or mid :) and can swap lanes around so we all can have a go <3

replies.body: I removed you as you were super tilting and negative like I said my life is already too negative don't need more in it soz Hun xx also why would you feel used as it was only a normals lol not like I used you to climb in rank or something. Xx
